#installing packages

```{r}
#| echo: true
library(rinat) 
library(magrittr) 
library(sf) 
library(leaflet) 
library(htmltools) 

```

#calling and inspecting data from iNaturalist

```{r}
#| echo: true
beetle_obs <- get_inat_obs(taxon_name = "Anthia decemguttata",
                           maxresults = 1000)
head(beetle_obs)
colnames(beetle_obs)
```
